name: The Travelling Food Tuk
close_time: Open 11:30 AM to 2:00 PM (Call by 4PM on previous day)
description: The Travelling Food Tuk is a lunch-delivery place - the food is home-made, gourmet even, and the prices not too bad.
tip: Apparently you can get super chocolatey desserts on Thursdays - check her Facebook page 'Chocolicious by Yashasvi Kannangara'.
